item.title: [RBX/GRA][MXPlan] - Switch Loadbalancer migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 20, 21:00 - 22:00 UTC

Aug 16, 07:41 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our collaborative solutions offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 20/08/2024 21:00 UTC
End time : 20/08/2024 22:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance operation, emails will not be accessible for around 10 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will switch customer network mail flow from NSX-V to NSX-T on mxplan1.mail.ovh.net infra.

Thank you for your understanding.
